resources.string: Please make sure you enter an email address and password!
Account successfully created! You can now Login.
The next options enable location based services. they are optional.

Your Basa device can use google\'s Firebase (Realtime Database), this allows you to control your device from anywhere even outside of home.\n \nWithout firebase you can only control your device locally or with a VPN.
You disabled Firebase, this is not recomended. With firebase the app works both with internet and without.
The following items are optional but are needed if the device needs to control lights/HVAC.
We are almost finished, the last thing to do is define your Pin code. It allows you to change any settings later on.
